Text: ENJOY Gheeto Stores 2010 DVDRip by LKRG.
I cant find this movie @ imdb. Wanted to read the story line. Do you have a link for it?

STARRING: WEBBIE, LIL BOOSIE, TYRIN TURNER, NICOLE 'HOOPZ' ALEXANDER, BUN B, LIL TRILL,
LIL' PHAT, FOXX & KADE

Synopsis:
In the streets of Baton Rouge, there are only two sides of the track. In the midst of a street war of South vs. North, Marcus Hatch (Lil' Boosie) and Jai 'Savage' Carter (Webbie) find themselves as rival drug dealers struggling to make ends meet. With the streets at war, someone must suffer the consequences. This movie centers on the personal challenges, setbacks, and dilemmas of street life.
Must be a really crap movie if it is not on IMDB!!!

I can't agree with "haydn70ac" that if is not on IMDB, it doesn't exist... Trill Entertainment is a company that used to be a record company, and in 2010 begun releasing straight-to-DVD movies. So this might be the reason is not on IMDB. You can watch a trailer here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gROaFOAioYA
My feeling is that's kinda ghetto soap opera, but I don't need IMDB to use my own brain...
I actually liked the movie. It is rough around the edges, but so is the hood.
